tips.title: Recycle paper, plastic, and glass properly.
tips.description: Sort your waste into appropriate recycling bins. Clean containers before recycling and flatten cardboard boxes.
tips.impact: Reduces landfill waste and saves resources

tips.title: Avoid single-use plastics whenever possible.
tips.description: Choose reusable alternatives like cloth bags, metal straws, and refillable containers.
tips.impact: Reduces plastic pollution and carbon footprint

tips.title: Use compost bins for organic waste.
tips.description: Collect food scraps, coffee grounds, and yard waste for composting to create natural fertilizer.

tips.title: Turn off lights when leaving a room.
tips.description: Make it a habit to switch off lights in unoccupied rooms to conserve electricity.

tips.title: Use reusable water bottles.
tips.description: Invest in a durable water bottle instead of buying disposable plastic bottles.
tips.impact: Reduces plastic waste and saves money

tips.title: Print double-sided.
tips.description: Set your printer to double-sided printing by default to reduce paper consumption.

tips.title: Use natural light when possible.
tips.description: Position workspaces near windows and utilize natural light instead of artificial lighting.
tips.impact: Reduces energy consumption and improves well-being

tips.title: Properly dispose of electronic waste.
tips.description: Take electronics to certified recycling centers instead of throwing them in regular trash.
tips.impact: Prevents toxic materials from entering landfills

tips.title: Use eco-friendly cleaning products.
tips.description: Choose cleaning products that are biodegradable and environmentally certified.
tips.impact: Reduces water pollution and chemical exposure

tips.title: Keep electronics unplugged when not in use.
tips.description: Unplug devices and chargers when not in use to prevent phantom energy consumption.
